revision.text: ==English== {{wikipedia|Video Graphics Array}} ===Proper noun=== {{en-proper noun}} # {{label|en|computer graphics}} Extended Graphics Array, a [[computer]] [[display]] [[standard]] of the 1990s, offering various [[resolution]]s and [[palette]]s and using a 4:3 [[aspect ratio]]. ====Related terms==== * [[CGA]] * [[EGA]] * [[EVGA]] * [[SVGA]] * [[SXGA]] * [[VGA]]
